vote.title: Authorize (1) a public hearing to be held on March 25, 2020, to receive comments concerning the expansion of the Dallas Tourism Public Improvement District (District) in accordance with House Bill 1136 legislation, which was approved during the 86th Texas Legislative Session, allowing the City to include property in a hotel-public improvement district (hotel-PID) if such property could have been included in the District without violating the petition thresholds when the District was created, for the purpose of providing supplemental public services to be funded by assessments on Dallas hotels with 100 or more rooms; and at the close of the hearing, (2) a resolution approving the expanded boundaries of the District to include an estimated 12 additional Dallas hotels in the District not described in the resolution or petition re-establishing the District in 2016 - Financing: No cost consideration to the City (see Fiscal Information)
